Key: Mm...
(Hey, I'm not... in my room.)
Um... Where am I...?!

(I immediately sat up and my brain started to wake
up―That's right... I slept in Rinne's room with Rio...
but where's... Rio?)
...Where did Rio go?

(It was just Rinne and me in the bed... That's not
good.)

(...Maybe I can go home while she's sleeping. I'm
sure Kotori isn't back yet... And Maria may know
where Rio went.)
Thanks, Rinne... I'll see you later.

(Rinne didn't answer me. But I felt like she gave me
a small laugh.)
Oh, Onii-chan, welcome home!
Oh, hey. You're home already?
Yeah. It was so fun～
That's nice. And you're eating breakfast.

Yes. Kotori called for me and said she wanted toast
for breakfast.

There's more than just jam here. What's up with all
these?

I bought them? And now you just get veeeeeeeeerry
little.

Veeeeery... Hey Kotori?! There's no more cash in my
wallet?! How much did you buy?!
Uh... Well there's crab, uni, shrimp...
It's obvious a normal household wouldn't need this!
It's delicious. Right, Maria?
Yes. I can't believe it's toast.
Gosh, you guys...
(And then...)
(Our "ordinary lives" slowly passed...)

"(And suddenly "this world" ended. Suddenly. Without
warning.)"

(Everything was engulfed in darkness. And I realized
that once again, I wasn't able to say goodbye.)
Huh... What was I doing again?

(As I said that, I looked around me. I was obviously
in my room. I stood in front of the desk and opened
my drawer, but...?)

Huh? What was I doing just now? ...Ugh. I can't
remember.

(I went to go get something in my room, but I forgot
what it was... I guess that's not the first time it's
happened.)

(I got home from school and came to get something...
but I forgot. I feel like I've been in a daze for a
long time.)
Am I... sick?

(It's not like my body felt anything, so I can't really
tell.)

Hey, Shido. You're here, right? Give Tohka the snack
you made the other day.
I can't wait to try your homemade snack!
Hey, it's evening already. If you eat it now―Oh.
(I thought and I stopped myself. Tohka will be fine.)
Uh... Oh, I have to close the drawer. Hang on!

(...I felt like I was forgetting something. I feel
like it was something really important. But I couldn't
bring myself to remember for some reason...)
